name: Hezrou
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks,Demonic Resilience

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hezrou makes one Sticky Tongue attack, one Bite attack, and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 15 (2d10+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 17 (3d8+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sticky Tongue
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the hezrou.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Demonic Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the poisoned condition.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou can communicate with frogs and toads as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 16 CON save or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a success, the creature is immune to the hezrou's Stench for the next 24 hours.
